header.title: Magick, Manifesting, And The High Self

central_thesis: Reality is malleable and can be consciously shaped through structured magical operations that leverage will, imagination, and energy, by aligning with a 'High Self' and systematically addressing limiting beliefs. The system emphasizes a command-oriented, results-driven approach, integrating traditional esoteric concepts with pragmatic psychological and energetic techniques for practical influence and manifestation.

structure_content.chapter_title: Part One: Magick, Manifesting, And The High Self (Intro)
structure_content.summary: This section defines 'psychic influence' as the ability to affect events via non-sensory means and 'magick' as deliberate change through will and imagination, utilizing body, breath, and mind energy to select and shape reality. It distinguishes magick from science by the probability of coincidences involved.

structure_content.chapter_title: The Huna Prayer Process: Magickal Manifestation Through The High Self/Clearing Limiting Decisions To Manifesting
structure_content.summary: Explores common pitfalls in manifestation (e.g., 'supplication destroys deservingness') and introduces the Huna prayer model. The core mechanism involves the Middle Self (conscious) forming desired images, the Low Self (unconscious) transmitting them to the High Self (SuperConscious), which then manifests them. Emphasizes identifying and removing 'limiting decisions' (unconscious, self-sabotaging prayers).

A foundational concept, stressing that the practitioner must cultivate a 'Magickal Self' — free from weaknesses and a 'will to fail' — to ensure successful operations. All magical actions must be channeled through a 'willingness to be commanding.'

structure_content.chapter_title: Day Two: Remote Influence Skills Camp! (Exercises One to Ten)
structure_content.summary: A series of practical exercises designed to develop foundational skills for remote influence, including sensory defocus, perspective shifting, energetic extension, and basic remote contact, preparing the practitioner for more advanced rituals.

structure_content.chapter_title: Part Two-Day Two (Review of Huna Prayer/Magickal Self from day One)
structure_content.summary: This section introduces specific remote influence rituals, building upon the theoretical framework and preparatory exercises. It provides step-by-step instructions for influencing individuals or groups using energetic and mental programming techniques.

structure_content.chapter_title: How To Silently Get Someone To Eagerly Approach YOU First And Make The First Move: The Short Distance Draw
structure_content.summary: A nine-step ritual focusing on subtly influencing a target to initiate contact. It involves state alteration, visualizing an 'idealized self,' projecting an 'energy packet,' sensing the target's physical response, commanding desired images into their mind, and shifting perspectives to observe the target's internal motivation and external actions.

structure_content.chapter_title: Pre-Influencing More Than One Person Or A Group
structure_content.summary: Adapts the 'Short Distance Draw' principles for multiple targets, involving the visualization of the 'ideal self' as a hovering energy field, sweeping over and influencing a group.

structure_content.chapter_title: Remotely Influencing Version One: The Etheric Yank
structure_content.summary: A comprehensive 26-step ritual designed to 'draw' a specific person or desired outcome. Key steps include energetic self-creation, invoking the High Self, visualizing an energy tunnel to the target, energetically 'yanking' them closer, manipulating their 'energy meridians,' and programming desired 'movies' into their mind by shifting perspectives. Ethical consideration of 'Magick MUST serve the interests of MORE than one person' is highlighted.

structure_content.chapter_title: Remotely Influencing Version Two: Dream VCR
structure_content.summary: A 24-step ritual for influencing a target while they are asleep. It employs a mental 'TV/VCR' analogy: the practitioner performs a 'psychic Head-butt,' connects a 'cable' from a dream 'TV' to the target's head, and 'plays' a 'video-tape' of desired images and sensations directly into their dream mind for subconscious programming.

A ritual for self-empowerment and integration of personal resources. It involves energizing oneself, stepping into a 'quantum soup' of possibilities, visualizing and commanding various resources (manifestation, decisive action, playfulness, commanding presence) to send energy into the practitioner, and finally, symbolically integrating these energies into a 'Ring of Power' worn on the finger.

structure_content.chapter_title: Interview: Joe Polish with Ross Jeffries
structure_content.summary: An interview segment where Ross Jeffries discusses his philosophy on entrepreneurship, marketing, Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP), and personal development. He emphasizes the importance of a 'propulsion system' (combining 'move towards' gain and 'move away from' loss motivation), creating an 'enemy' in marketing, embracing failure, and continuous learning. This section provides context for the mindset underpinning his magical system.

key_concepts.definition: Change in accordance with one's will and imagination, utilizing the energy of body, breath, and mind. It involves selecting a desired reality and shaping past events or future circumstances to align with it.

The ability to influence events, people, and circumstances using means other than or in proper conjunction with normal sensory perception, requiring the recognition, building, and use of specific energies, attitudes, beliefs, and states of consciousness.

Derived from Huna philosophy, this is a higher aspect of consciousness or 'Parental Spirit' that receives thought forms from the Middle Self (conscious mind) via the Low Self (unconscious mind) and manifests them in both the Higher Realm and the physical realm.

Deeply held, often unconscious, beliefs or decisions about one's deservingness or reality, which function as 'prayers' to the High Self and can inadvertently manifest undesired outcomes. Identifying and removing these is crucial for magical success.

A prepared, empowered aspect of the self, cultivated to be free from weaknesses and self-sabotaging tendencies ('will to fail'). This self embodies the 'willingness to be commanding' and is the conduit through which all magical operations are channeled.

A marketing and influence principle that combines two motivational drivers: 'moving towards' desired gains and 'moving away from' feared losses or negative consequences. This dual approach is deemed essential to compel action in targets who are not inherently entrepreneurial or self-motivated.

A remote influence ritual designed to 'draw' a specific person or desired event towards the practitioner. It involves creating a psychic tunnel, energetically 'yanking' the target, and programming their energy meridians and mental 'movie screen' with desired interactions.

A remote influence ritual for subconscious programming of a sleeping target. It uses an imaginative analogy of a 'TV/VCR' system connected to the target's head to 'play' a 'video-tape' of desired images, thoughts, and feelings directly into their dream state.

A self-empowerment ritual where the practitioner visualizes and integrates various beneficial resources (e.g., manifestation energy, decisive action, playfulness, commanding presence) into a symbolic ring, which is then 'worn' to imbue these qualities for ongoing use.

practical_system.description: Ross Jeffries' system for Magickal Manifestation and Remote Influence is a synthesis of Huna prayer principles, NLP techniques, and focused energetic projection. It operates on the premise that reality is shaped by conscious and unconscious 'decisions' (which function as prayers to a 'High Self') and can be deliberately altered through precise ritual work. The system requires the practitioner to cultivate a 'Magickal Self' — an empowered, commanding aspect of their being — and to clear deeply ingrained limiting beliefs. Operations involve a structured flow of energy and intent, typically from the conscious (Middle Self) through the unconscious (Low Self) to the SuperConscious (High Self) for manifestation, always aiming for outcomes that serve the 'greater good of all concerned' to ensure efficacy. A key philosophical underpinning is the 'engineering' of probable or less probable coincidences through focused will and imagination.
tools: Body, Breath, and Mind (as sources and channels of energy and intent)
Visualization and Imagination (for creating thought forms and scenarios)
Energetic Projection (directing energy towards targets or for self-empowerment)
Perspective Shifting (mentally viewing situations from the target's point of view to implant suggestions)
Defocus of Vision / Thumb Technique (simple methods for altering one's state of consciousness)
Energized Breathing (to generate and direct life force/mana)
Magickal Circle (a symbolic or literal space for ritual work and energy containment)
Aka Cord (the energetic link to the High Self, used for communication and manifestation)
Energy Meridians (channels within the body/aura, which can be 'zipped' and 'unzipped' to facilitate energy flow and programming)
Tunnel/Tube (a visualized energetic conduit for connecting with and 'pulling' targets)
TV/VCR (a mental construct used in the 'Dream VCR' ritual to symbolize subconscious programming)
Symbolic objects like gold candles, incense, and noisemakers (used for personal preference to enhance focus and 'clear the space' for ritual work).
rituals: The Huna Prayer Process: A four-step sequence for manifestation, involving the Middle Self (conscious) forming desired images, the Unconscious (Low Self) connecting these images and energy to the High Self (SuperConscious), and the High Self manifesting them in both its realm and the physical realm.

The Short Distance Draw: A nine-step ritual to compel a target to approach the practitioner. It involves altering one's state, visualizing an 'idealized self,' projecting an 'energy packet' into the target's back, sensing their physical response, commanding specific images into their mind, perspective shifting, and visualizing desired interactions.

The Etheric Yank: A 26-step ritual for remote influence and drawing specific people or outcomes. It includes energizing oneself, invoking the High Self, visualizing a 'tunnel' to the target, energetically 'yanking' them, unzipping and filling their 'energy meridians,' removing and reattaching their head (symbolically for subconscious integration), programming a 'movie screen' of desired interactions, and closing the ritual with a 'rain of blessings.'

The Dream VCR: A 24-step ritual for subconscious programming of a sleeping target. It involves establishing psychic rapport, performing a 'Psychic Head-butt,' visualizing a 'TV' with a 'cable' plugged into the target's occiput, and 'playing' a 'video-tape' of desired images, thoughts, and feelings into their dream mind for continuous looping.

The Ring of Power: A self-empowerment ritual to integrate and activate personal resources. It involves deep breathing, stepping into a 'quantum soup,' visualizing and commanding resources (e.g., manifestation, decisive action, playfulness, commanding presence) from outside a magical circle to send energy into oneself, and finally, symbolically condensing these energies into a ring worn on the finger for continuous empowerment.

relevant_quotes.text: "Personally, we prefer to consider science as the study and engineering of highly probable coincidences, such as the tendency of apples to fall downwards when dropped from trees. We prefer to consider magick as the study and engineering of less probable coincidences, such as the tendency of trees to drop apples when we ask them to."....Peter J. Carroll "Psyber Magick"

"All magic is, is change. I move things from here to there, change this thought to that thought, step behind the scenes and rearrange the set...remix reality"....The Doctor, "The Authority", Warren Ellis

It is a primary rule of magick that who you bring into an operation is going to be what you get out. If you bring in your old self. ..loaded with weakness, lack of being deserving, an iron "will to fail" then that is what you will get out....but magnified many times worse. Therefore first and foremost to make magick work you must: Creating the willingness to be commanding. All you operations must be channeled through this willingness.
Magick MUST serve the interests of MORE than one person for it to truly work!

Do NOT LUST FOR RESULTS! This should be done, as all of what you are learning, with an attitude of relaxed expectation. Nudge the universe...don't NOODGE..avoid the "Daddy..are we there yet?" phenomena!

Remember too: YOU WILL GET NOT WHAT YOU "WANT" BUT WHAT THE ENERGIES YOU CREATE AND PROJECT CAN CONNECT WITH! If your energy/intent is needy, hostile, angry then this ritual will ONLY work to draw those who are in that place. Clear your energy to one of relaxed, excited, happy.....eager to share something that will work out best for ALL concerned AND yet commanding at the same time.

The "prayer" was, "I deserve ALMOST success with women....NOT QUITE success...but I can NEVER get there because I am a bad person who would abuse this power. THIS is who I am and THIS is what I will always have with women".

critical_analysis.relevance: Ross Jeffries' work is highly relevant within modern practical magic and esoteric circles, especially for practitioners interested in direct, results-oriented influence. It successfully bridges esoteric concepts (like the High Self from Huna) with contemporary psychological models (NLP) and entrepreneurial mindsets. The system offers a pragmatic approach to manifestation and remote influence, emphasizing mental discipline, energy work, and a 'commanding' attitude over traditional supplicatory prayer. Its focus on mindset, overcoming limiting beliefs, and iterative practice aligns well with modern self-help while providing a distinct magical framework.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The primary target audience consists of advanced practitioners and students of Western Esotericism and Occultism, particularly those engaged in Chaos Magic or other results-oriented magical systems. Individuals seeking to apply magical principles for personal success in areas like entrepreneurship, sales, and interpersonal relationships (seduction, leadership) would also find this system highly appealing. The direct, sometimes provocative, language and emphasis on practical, measurable outcomes indicate an audience that values effectiveness and personal empowerment.
